attributes.action: Acknowledge false information contributed to Leave victory in EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: Leave won by 634,751 votes, this makes up 3.65% of their 17,410,742 votes. Rounding up to 4% one arrives at 1 in 25.
attributes.background: The untrue £350million/week EU membership fee figure was strongly advertised by Vote Leave. The Leave campaign won by a narrow margin, and if 1 in 25 of their supporters voted based off of this fallacy then the result of the referendum cannot be considered the definitive will of the British people.
